name: Brave Dungeon: Roguelite RPG
description:
Game Introduction:

Brand new IDLE RPG with one-hand operation is coming. Abundant dungeons for you to explore!

1. Multiple Factions, Tons of Heroes to Choose!
Epic heroes accompany you to battle. Different factions and 4 classes contributes to the strategy for the game. Easy to pick up, hard to get peak.

2. Dungeon Adventure, Explore the Unknown Pleasure!
Explore the unknown dungeons, complete random tasks to get super rich rewards.

3. Free Your Hands, Idle System & AFK Mode!
Worry-free one-hand operation. Play the game anywhere at anytime. Level up quicly and gain lots of offline rewards.

4. Abundant Gameplays, Enjoy Social & Strategic Fun!
Fight for your honor in Real-time Team Dungeon. Invite your teamates to form your strongest team, challenge dungeon bosses together to win rare rewards.
Also you can’t miss the strategic autochess gameplay. Win the battle with your strategy and fortune.
